name: TLS 1.0 Enabled on HTTPS Interface
description: Old TLS version is still enabled on this web server
solution: Disable TLS 1.0 and use TLS 1.2+ only

name: Remote Code Execution in Web Framework
description: Critical RCE vulnerability in the application framework
solution: Patch the framework to the latest secure version

name: Outdated Database Server
description: Database server not on latest minor version
solution: Plan upgrade to latest supported database version

name: SMB Signing Not Required
description: SMB signing is not required on this host
solution: Enable SMB signing as per hardening guidelines
